about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I love creating efficient, scalable applications that solve real-world problems.
about.bio2: With experience in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies, I enjoy working on projects that make a positive impact on users' lives.
about.bio3: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.
